title: Hudson Taylor's Spiritual Secret
description: Discover Hudson Taylor, a pioneer missionary to China, who suffered tribulation, hardship, poverty, and misunderstanding. But at his heart, he loved the Chinese people and learned through his misfortunes to trust God completely. 'HUDSON TAYLOR'S SPIRITUAL SECRET' is a stirring biography that challenges you to live a life of faith.RUNNING TIME â‡’ 7hrs. and 16mins.Public Domain (P)2011 christianaudio.com
author: F. Howard Taylor
